name: maple.
description:
maple - staring Wilbo. fall through the autumn scene to gain the highest score. the game uses ragdoll physics to make Wilbo bump and tumble through the game world. 

controls.

spacebar: jump, double jump.

credits.

inspiration: https://wayfarergames.itch.io/yeet-me

particle effect: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/smoke-particles

music tutorial: (1) Adding Background Music in Unity - YouTube

GUI sound effects: https://opengameart.org/content/gui-sound-effects (CC0)

impact sounds: https://kenney.nl/assets/impact-sounds

platformer game music pack: https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-game-music-pack (CC-BY 3.0)

settings tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YOaYQrN1oYQ
